Description_lang: After casting Barrier of Faith or Holy Prism, the healing of your next Holy Light or Flash of Light is increased by $210294m1%, its cast time is reduced by $210294s2%, and its mana cost is reduced by $210294s3%.

description_blz.en_US: After casting Barrier of Faith or Holy Prism, the healing of your next Holy Light or Flash of Light is increased by 20%, its cast time is reduced by 30%, and its mana cost is reduced by 50%.
description_blz.es_MX: Después de lanzar Barrera de fe o Prisma sagrado, la sanación de tu siguiente Luz sagrada o Destello de luz aumenta un 20%, su tiempo de lanzamiento se reduce un 30% y el costo de maná se reduce un 50%.
description_blz.pt_BR: Após lançar Barreira de Fé ou Prisma Sagrado, a cura do seu próximo uso de Luz Sagrada ou Clarão de Luz aumenta em 20%, o tempo de lançamento é reduzido em 30% e o custo de mana é reduzido em 50%.
description_blz.de_DE: Nach dem Einsatz von 'Barriere des Glaubens' oder 'Heiliges Prisma' sind die Heilung Eures nächsten Einsatzes von 'Heiliges Licht' oder 'Lichtblitz' um 20% erhöht sowie die Zauberzeit um 30% und die Manakosten um 50% verringert.
description_blz.en_GB: After casting Barrier of Faith or Holy Prism, the healing of your next Holy Light or Flash of Light is increased by 20%, its cast time is reduced by 30%, and its mana cost is reduced by 50%.
description_blz.es_ES: Tras lanzar Barrera de fe o Prisma Sagrado, aumenta un 20% la sanación de tu siguiente Luz Sagrada o Destello de Luz, además de reducir un 30% su tiempo de lanzamiento y un 50% su coste de maná.
description_blz.fr_FR: Après lancement de Barrière de foi ou Prisme sacré, les soins de votre prochain sort Éclair lumineux ou Lumière sacrée sont augmentés de 20 %, son temps d’incantation est réduit de 30 % et son coût en mana de 50 %.
description_blz.it_IT: Lanciare Barriera della Fede o Prisma Sacro aumenta le cure fornite dal successivo lancio di Luce Sacra o Lampo di Luce del 20%, ne riduce il tempo di lancio del 30% e ne riduce il costo in mana del 50%.
description_blz.ru_RU: После применения "Барьера веры" или "Божественной призмы" следующий "Свет небес" или "Вспышка Света" восполняет на 20% больше здоровья, применяется на 30% быстрее и стоит на 50% меньше маны.
description_blz.ko_KR: 신념의 방벽 또는 신성한 반사를 시전하면 다음 성스러운 빛이나 빛의 섬광의 치유량이 20%만큼 증가하고, 시전 시간은 30%만큼, 마나 소모량은 50%만큼 감소합니다.
description_blz.zh_TW: 施放信念屏障或神聖稜石後，你下一個聖光術或聖光閃現的治療效果提高20%，施法時間縮短30%，法力消耗降低50%。
description_blz.zh_CN: 施放信仰屏障或神圣棱镜后，你的下一个圣光术或圣光闪现的治疗效果提高20%，施法时间缩短30%，法力值消耗降低50%。
